EmailTemplate.name: Current Trial: January 2016.Day 08 Not Engaged
EmailTemplate.subject: We haven’t seen you in a few days
EmailTemplate.textOnly: You have 1 week left in your free trial. Log in today to get started building your store. You have 1 week left in your trial We haven’t seen you in a few days, but don’t worry: you still have a week left in your free trial to build and launch your online store. We make it easy to do — just log in today to get started. Visit your store today <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login]]> Need help? Bigcommerce University <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/university]]> has dozens of videos that will show you how to build, launch and grow your store. Or you can speak with one of our ecommerce experts at 1-866-949-5336 <[[tel:+18669495336]]>.
